title: Perplexity delivers factual and relevant answers with Claude \ Anthropic

metadata.title: Perplexity delivers factual and relevant answers with Claude \ Anthropic
metadata.description: Perplexity uses the Claude model family to deliver factual and relevant search results to users. By employing various models—Claude 3.5 Sonnet, Claude 3 Opus, and Claude 3 Haiku—Perplexity optimizes cost, performance, and accuracy for both its free and paid users.
